name: npm-test-npmrc-evil-postinstall
description: A test package for whether I can trick a package manager into installing the postinstall script.
author: M.K. (https://github.com/mk-pmb)

scripts.test: elp && echo -n '# node ' && node --version && echo -n '# npm  v' && npm --version && npm config list | sed -nre '/config from|scripts/s~^~# npm config: ~p' && node test.js
